Commands.Aquamarine Waterglint: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Water Dragon for 2 turns and removes Thunder Tsar.  Water Dragon raises Water-elemental damage by 20% and turns BRV Attack to Deluge.  If STR 55 Passive Ability is equipped, the ability becomes 2-HIT and AoE.  Water Dragon will then also turn HP Attack to Dragon Wave.
Commands.Peridot Thunderflash: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Thunder Tsar for 2 turns and removes Water Dragon.  Thunder Tsar raises Thunder-elemental damage by 20% and turns BRV Attack to Superbolt.  If STR 60 Passive Ability is equipped, the ability becomes 2-HIT and AoE.  Thunder Tsar will then also turn HP Attack to Judgement Hammer.
Commands.BRV Regen&Boost All: Marginally raises party Max BRV and grants BRV regen for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Sacred Prayer: Moderately restores all party members' HP.  Raises all party members' BRV based on Garnet's Max BRV.  Grants Sacred Prayer to the party for 10 turns.  Sacred Prayer grants BRV regen, Enchant Water and Enchant Thunder.

Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Aquamarine Waterglint Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Aquamarine Waterglint.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Peridot Thunderflash Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Peridot Thunderflash.
Passives.Blessing of Alexandria: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after using an AoE.
Passives.Aquamarine Waterglint Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Aquamarine Waterglint.
Passives.Peridot Thunderflash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Peridot Thunderflash.
Passives.Princess's Resolve: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Buff Boost: Greatly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Aquamarine Waterglint Extend: Increases the max uses of Aquamarine Waterglint by 1.Turns it into a 2-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack and slightly raises its potency.Turns HP Attack to Dragon Wave while Water Dragon is active.Dragon Wave raises all allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt (except self).
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Peridot Thunderflash Extend: Increases the max uses of Peridot Thunderflash by 1.Turns it into a 2-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack and moderately raises its potency.Turns HP Attack to Judgement Hammer while Thunder Tsar is active.Judgement Hammer raises party's BRV based on Attack before inflicting an HP attack.
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Destruction: Raises party Initial BRV and Max BRV by 10%
Passives.BRV Regen&Boost All Extend: When using  BRV Regen&Boost All , adds the following effects:- Marginally improves the  Max BRV Up  effect- Slightly improves the  BRV Regen  effect

Weapons.Asura's Rod CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Sacred Prayer.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: BRV Regen&Boost All  use +1Duration of  BRV Regen&Boost All  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Stardust Rod CP: 15: Increases the potency of Aquamarine Waterglint.Inflicts Water Resistance Down for 4 turns.Grants BRV Regen to all party members for 4 turns and extends Water Dragon's duration to 4 turns.
Weapons.Healing Rod CP: 35: Increases the potency of Peridot Thunderflash.Inflicts Thunder Resistance Down for 4 turns.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 4 turns and extends Thunder Tsar's duration to 4 turns.
